title: 98/103/EC: Commission Decision of 26 January 1998 amending Commission Decision 97/467/EC drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorise imports of rabbit meat and farmed game meat (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 26 January 1998 amending Commission Decision 97/467/EC drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorise imports of rabbit meat and farmed game meat (Text with EEA relevance) (98/103/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. In Article 1 paragraph 2 of Decision 97/467/EC, the following words 'other than ratite meat` are inserted after the words: '(. . .) meats of farmed game`.
2. In Article 1 of Decision 97/467/EC, the following paragraph is inserted between paragraph 2 and paragraph 3:
'2a. Member States may authorise establishments for import of ratite meat up to 1 October 1998.`
The Annex to Decision 97/467/EC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision with regard to Australia.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 January 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 243, 11. 10. 1995, p. 17.
(2) OJ L 13, 16. 1. 1997, p. 33.
(3) OJ L 199, 26. 7. 1997, p. 57.
